name: Spider Story: Perspective Specialization Guide
description: Supplement to the main cognitive_framework.json, detailing how specific perspectives manifest in the Spider story. Shows transformation of perspectives in emotional archiving context.

primary_explicit.name: psychologický
primary_explicit.why_key: Central to story's exploration of unsaid emotions and internal states
manifestations: Objectification of feelings: 'Pocity, co se nehodily'
Internal-external dynamics: emotions become external objects
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer G (ENTITY) rather than base layer E (STATE) - psychological states become tangible entities

primary_explicit.name: metaforický
primary_explicit.why_key: Story relies on web as metaphor for emotional storage system
manifestations: Web as mental space: storage for unsaid words
Hanging as emotional suspension: between happening and not happening
Objects as emotions: words/past events as physical burdens
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer E (STATE) rather than base layer H (ROLE) - metaphors become psychological states

primary_explicit.name: paradoxní
primary_explicit.why_key: Story presents paradoxes of emotional preservation
manifestations: 'Největší pád je když se nic nezmění' - paradox of stasis as fall
'Když to visí, ještě to může být' vs. 'Pak už je to jen minulost'
Preservation as both protection and paralysis
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer K (LAW) rather than base layer I (TIME) - paradoxes become governing principles

secondary_implicit.name: filozofický
secondary_implicit.why_key: Philosophical questions about being/non-being of emotions
manifestations: Ontology of unsaid: do unspoken words exist?
Temporality of emotions: suspended vs. fallen time

secondary_implicit.name: absurdní
manifestations: Hanging apologies, loves, Sundays that never happened
Spider hanging silence as final act
Wind that moves but doesn't drop

secondary_implicit.name: naivní
secondary_implicit.why_key: Mouse's simple questions reveal complex truths
manifestations: 'A co když to visí moc dlouho?'

layer_transformations_specific_to_spider.transformation_description: Psychological states move from internal condition to external entity. Emotions become tangible objects with physical presence.
layer_transformations_specific_to_spider.story_evidence: Feelings become 'things that can't be held', apologies hang like ornaments

layer_transformations_specific_to_spider.transformation_description: Metaphors move from functional role to psychological state. Figurative language becomes actual emotional condition.
layer_transformations_specific_to_spider.story_evidence: 'Web' moves from metaphor to literal emotional storage system

layer_transformations_specific_to_spider.transformation_description: Paradoxes move from temporal dimension to governing principle. Contradictions become laws of emotional system.
layer_transformations_specific_to_spider.story_evidence: Paradox of 'biggest fall is when nothing changes' becomes emotional law

perspective_interactions_unique_to_spide.description: Fusion of psychological states and metaphorical objects. Emotions don't just feel like objects - they become objects.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_spide.manifestation: Unsaid love isn't just 'like' a hanging thing - it literally hangs in the web

perspective_interactions_unique_to_spide.description: Conflict between paradoxical emotional laws and philosophical time. Time both matters and doesn't matter emotionally.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_spide.manifestation: Time both hardens emotions (if they hang too long) and is irrelevant (wind moves but nothing falls)

perspective_interactions_unique_to_spide.description: Naive questions reveal complex psychological truths. Simple observation exposes emotional economics.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_spide.manifestation: Mouse's simple questions reveal spider's entire emotional preservation strategy

woman_in_web.description: Literalized metaphor of emotional entanglement, psychological state made visible, absurd surrealism

text_web_integration.description: Linguistic-physical fusion, words as structural elements of emotional web

upside_down_position.description: Paradoxical perspective, ironic reversal of normal emotional orientation

ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.e_psychological: Can AI recognize emotional objectification? Can it work with emotions as externalized entities?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.h_metaphorical: Can AI analyze web as emotional storage system? Can it track metaphor literalization processes?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.i_paradoxical: Can AI work with emotional paradoxes? Can it understand preservation as both protection and paralysis?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.layer_transformations: Can AI detect how perspectives shift layers in emotional archiving context?

with_mouse.contrast: Mouse: epistemological observation; Spider: emotional archiving

with_sparrow.contrast: Sparrow: spatial value economics; Spider: emotional suspension economics

with_butterfly.contrast: Butterfly: metaphor literalization as food; Spider: metaphor literalization as emotional objects

note: This guide supplements but does not replace cognitive_framework.json. It shows how the universal perspectives manifest specifically in the Spider story's context of emotional archiving.
